Attacks.Name: Water Pulse
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Stun special condition.

Attacks.Name: Rapid Spin
Attacks.Effect: This attack allows Wartortle to move S after the attack is resolved. If a wild is rolled, remove one special condition from Wartortle.

Attacks.Name: Hydro Pump
Attacks.Effect: This attack deals damage to all characters (friend and foe) within range 1 of the target character.

Superpowers.Name: Aqua Shell
Superpowers.Effect: Add 2 dice to Wartortle's defense rolls and gain 1 power. This superpower can be used only once per turn.

Superpowers.Name: Whirlpool
Superpowers.Effect: Choose an enemy character within range and line of sight. That character is pulled S towards Wartortle.

Attacks.Name: Shell Smash
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Wartortle gains the Shell Shield special condition, reducing damage from the next attack against it by 2.

Superpowers.Name: Tidal Retreat
Superpowers.Effect: Remove all special conditions from Wartortle and make an immediate move action.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Blastoise character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
